config.title: Header Style 04

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Rajdhadi, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 500 14px/1.35 Rajdhadi, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Rajdhadi, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-04" /> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row relative_pos" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-12 header-panel-middle" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-panel-right" /> <container name="header-panel-bottom" htmlId="header-panel-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-panel-bottom" /> </container> <container name="header-panel-row-2" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row" after="header-panel-row"> <container name="header-menu-container" htmlId="header-menu-container" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-menu-container" /> </container> </referenceContainer>
<move element="logo" destination="header-panel-middle" /> <move element="authorization-link-features" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="minicart" destination="header-panel-right" before="-" />
<referenceContainer name="header-panel-right"> <block class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" name="links.features.search" template="Magento_Search::search-trigger.phtml" after="-"> <arguments> <argument name="html_class" xsi:type="string">search-link</argument> <argument name="wrapper_tag" xsi:type="string">div</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer>
<referenceContainer name="header-panel-bottom"> <container name="header-search-wrap" before="-" htmlId="header-search-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-search-wrap" /> </referenceContainer>
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.left"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="array"> <item name="getHeaderWishlistStyle" xsi:type="string">wishlist-sidebar</item> <item name="getAccountPanelStyle" xsi:type="string">utilities.content</item> </argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.right"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="array"> <item name="getMiniCartStyle" xsi:type="string">minicart-sidebar</item> </argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceBlock name="authorization-link-features"> <action method="addData"> <argument name="value" xsi:type="array"> <item name="direction" xsi:type="string">left</item> <item name="section" xsi:type="string">utilities-main</item> </argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-menu-container" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-search-wrap" after="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
